div.p: ‘In the consulate of Septimius Acindynus, the most brilliant prefect of the sacred praetorium, and Populonius Proclus the most brilliant. Hathyr 16th. To Aurelius Dioscorus, overseer of the peace of the Oxyrhynchite nome, from Aurelius Aspidas son of Dius from the village of Chysis of the 1st pagus. … your Diligency … robbers in our custody … Regarding this, I acknowledge that it is true, swearing the august imperial oath of our lords the Augusts …’
